attributes.action: request that the BBC stop presenting such confusing and uninformative weather forecasts.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Specifically, listening to the narrative while watching the clock and trying to see the depicted weather conditions at that time is impossible – even when the part of the country where you live is being shown at a time that is relevant. 

Please ask the BBC to reinstate the simple static view of the UK, changing the display to depict the weather at the times people relate to – typically overnight, morning, afternoon and evening.
